channel.title: Feedburner on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Feedburner on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Google’s Zombie
item.description: Today in Tedium: Google may be the internet’s greatest murderer of ideas. Between its numerous acquihires, its aggressive approach to launching (and discarding) moonshots, and its tendency to build impressive products only to kill them months later, Google may be the greatest example of a cold-blooded idea killer in history. But one product under the search giant’s lineup strikes my fancy in particular, because Google never killed it, even though everyone thought it would.
